lead_paragraph: The second World Twenty20 semi-final is likely to hinge on who emerges on top in the battle between the big-hitting West Indian batsmen and India's wily spinners when the former champions clash at the Wankhede Stadium on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: India Bank on Spin to Blunt West Indian Weapons
headline.main: India Bank on Spin to Blunt West Indian Weapons

snippet: The second World Twenty20 semi-final is likely to hinge on who emerges on top in the battle between the big-hitting West Indian batsmen and India's wily spinners when the former champions clash at the Wankhede Stadium on Thursday....
